about_the_game:
Gameplay

This is a 2D role-playing game where players take on the role of a knight. In the game, players will gather materials, craft equipment, and interact with special statues to unlock mysterious powers.

Each time players lead their companions to defeat demons, they can collect power crystals. By infusing these power crystals into the portal, players can continuously upgrade it to summon even more powerful allies.

At regular intervals, hordes of demons will attack the portal. Lead your troops, build defensive structures, and fend off each wave of attacks!

Game Objective

Defend your portal and eliminate all demons and demon portals on the map.

Game Features

  • Supports thousands of units running simultaneously—prepare for massive enemy assaults!

  • Each game features unique maps, skills, and magic, requiring players to adapt their tactics based on the situation.

short_description: The once vibrant and thriving continent has been gradually decaying under the corruption of demons. To restore peace to the land, the mages have teleported you and your companions to the heart of the demons' lair through a portal. Defeat these demons and bring tranquility back to the continent!
